official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide authority for special bonuses for certain officers and employees of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare, for the purpose of recruiting and retaining officers and employees of the Department who demonstrate unusual talents and abilities or who have major supervisory duties, to give an annual bonus not to exceed $15,000 to such officers and employees. Restricts the number of recipients to 25 in a fiscal year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide authority for special bonuses for certain officers and employees of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare.
